name: Photo Finish
description:
SINGLE PLAYER OR LOCAL CO-OP ONLY. NO ONLINE MULTIPLAYER. REQUIRES AT LEAST ONE XBOX COMPATIBLE (OR EMULATED) CONTROLLER.
Photo Finish is a top-down local co-op vehicle brawler set in a post-apocalyptic world where up to 4 racers battle it out on deadly roads for fame and glory. Use powerful weaponry to decimate your foes, and turn their vehicles back into salvaged scrap metal. But be mindful of the great harvester, a deadly monstrosity that attempts to crush all who dare to race on the slopes of this desolate wasteland!
